name: DeviceUseStatement
title: DeviceUseStatement
publisher: Health Level Seven International (Orders and Observations)
description: A record of a device being used by a patient where the record is the result of a report from the patient or another clinician.

elements.name: DeviceUseStatement
elements.description: A record of a device being used by a patient where the record is the result of a report from the patient or another clinician.

elements.name: identifier
elements.description: An external identifier for this statement such as an IRI.

elements.name: basedOn
elements.description: A plan, proposal or order that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this DeviceUseStatement.

elements.name: status
elements.description: A code representing the patient or other source's judgment about the state of the device used that this statement is about.

elements.name: subject
elements.description: The patient who used the device.

elements.name: derivedFrom
elements.description: Allows linking the DeviceUseStatement to the underlying Request, or to other information that supports or is used to derive the DeviceUseStatement.

elements.name: timingTiming
elements.description: How often the device was used.

elements.name: timingPeriod
elements.description: How often the device was used.

elements.name: timingDateTime
elements.description: How often the device was used.

elements.name: recordedOn
elements.description: The time at which the statement was made/recorded.

elements.name: source
elements.description: Who reported the device was being used by the patient.

elements.name: device
elements.description: The details of the device used.

elements.name: reasonCode
elements.description: Reason or justification for the use of the device.

elements.name: reasonReference
elements.description: Indicates another resource whose existence justifies this DeviceUseStatement.

elements.name: bodySite
elements.description: Indicates the anotomic location on the subject's body where the device was used (i.e. the target).

elements.name: note
elements.description: Details about the device statement that were not represented at all or sufficiently in one of the attributes provided in a class.
